{{italic title|Blast}}
[[File:MCB Fountain.png|thumb|200px|A screenshot of one of the tasks in ''Minecraft Blast''.]]

'''Tasks''' are one of the main gameplay features within ''[[Minecraft Blast]]'' and is placed alongside the levels button with the home screen. Tasks use up energy in order for the player to progress through the story. Tasks like building or decorating have three different options, once the player has decided which one of the three pre-set builds they want, clicking accept makes the [[Companion (Blast)|companion]] build the chosen option (you can still change to other options whenever you want), while tasks like breeding, gathering and destroying have no options (building-related tasks can still have no options).

Tasks are grouped into [[Chapters (Blast)|chapters]] with each chapter coming with its own story and set of tasks. There are currently only three chapters in the game, with the [[Journey (Blast)|journey screen]] teasing a fourth.

== List of Tasks ==
The tasks are in the order they appear in. Some groups of tasks can be done at the same time, the order they're made in does not matter.
